flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Let's make a hanger from a branch!http://maizehutton.blogspot.com/2011/07/...
guide.introduction_rendered: Let's make a hanger from a branch!http://maizehutton.blogspot.com/2011/07/...

lines.text: Take a walk in the woods or on the beach.  Find a branch.  Let's make a hanger now!
lines.text_raw: Take a walk in the woods or on the beach.  Find a branch.  Let's make a hanger now!

lines.text: Besides your branch, you'll need the following tools:
lines.text_raw: Besides your branch, you'll need the following tools:

lines.text: Wire Hanger (mine was from the dollar store and I would have preferred a darker metal one) Wire cutters Pliers Saw (if you need to saw off the ends) Drill with drill bit that is the size of the wire Strong glue (I used E6000)  Peel off any bark 'cause you surely don't want it on your clothing or whatever you're going to be hanging.
lines.text_raw: Wire Hanger (mine was from the dollar store and I would have preferred a darker metal one) Wire cutters Pliers Saw (if you need to saw off the ends) Drill with drill bit that is the size of the wire Strong glue (I used E6000)  Peel off any bark 'cause you surely don't want it on your clothing or whatever you're going to be hanging.

lines.text: Use your pliers to unwrap the top of the wire hanger below the hook.  You might need to straighten  out the bottom a bit with your pliers also.
lines.text_raw: Use your pliers to unwrap the top of the wire hanger below the hook.  You might need to straighten  out the bottom a bit with your pliers also.

lines.text: Cut the wire below the hook portion.
lines.text_raw: Cut the wire below the hook portion.

lines.text: Determine the middle of the branch and drill a hole the same size as the wire.  Insert some glue in the hole then insert your hook.   Let it dry.   Easy huh?! It'd be super cute to carve or wood burn your initials in the middle!!!   And it'd be a great gift!
lines.text_raw: Determine the middle of the branch and drill a hole the same size as the wire.  Insert some glue in the hole then insert your hook.   Let it dry.   Easy huh?! It'd be super cute to carve or wood burn your initials in the middle!!!   And it'd be a great gift!

guide.summary: Take a walk in the woods or on the beach.  Find a branch and make a hanger!
guide.title: Make a Woodsy Hanger
